DataElement.preferredName: Negation Screening Mammogram Prior To Randomization Confirmation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Verification at a particular time that the patient did not have a screening mammogram prior to randomization, as outlined in the study protocol, in order to participate in a clinical study.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Negation Screening Mammography Prior To Randomization Confirmation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._X-rays of the breasts taken to check for breast cancer in the absence of signs or symptoms._Earlier in time or order._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._The allocation of individuals to groups by chance, especially in order to control the variables in an experiment._Having been established or verified._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.
